text: 6.10 2 Ko 7.4, Plp 2.17, Kol 1.24 Mɨŋel awl gek chɨb gup ak pen, pel mɨñmɨñ gɨpun. Yɨmgeptek mɨdobun ak pen, binɨb kɨlop gon, tap teplep kuŋay yɨbɨl dɨpal. Tap ma mɨdeb okok mɨdobun ak pen, tap okok mɨdupsek mɨdeb. Anɨb ak tɨtay gɨpun ak, binɨb chɨnop nɨŋɨd, bɨ God wog gɨñeb ne mɨdobun nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, mɨdupsek nep gɨtep gɨpun.
